row.process: :SET &result# = "0" :SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"*") :PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &line# = STR_TRIM(&line#) : SET &pos# = STR_FIND(&line#,"LDAP-RESULT: ") : IF &pos# > 0 : SET &pos# = &pos# + 13 : SET &line# = MID(&line#,&pos#) : SET &result# = &line# : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :PSET &UC4RB_OUT_LDAP_AUTH_RESULT# = &result#
